verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> by the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the promise <S%G1860><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

To Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> my dearly beloved <S%G27><s%> son: <S%G5043><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and peace, <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

I thank <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5485><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I serve <S%G3000><s%> from my forefathers <S%G4269><s%> with pure <S%G2513><s%> conscience, <S%G4893><s%> that without <S%G88><s%> ceasing <S%G83><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> remembrance <S%G3417><s%> of you in my prayers <S%G1162><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and day; <S%G2250><s%>
Greatly <S%G1971><s%> desiring <S%G1971><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> you, being mindful <S%G3403><s%> of your tears, <S%G1144><s%> that I may be filled <S%G4137><s%> with joy; <S%G5479><s%>

When I call <S%G2983><s%> to remembrance <S%G5280><s%> the unfeigned <S%G505><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> that is in you, which <S%G3748><s%> dwelled <S%G1774><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> in your grandmother <S%G3125><s%> Lois, <S%G3090><s%> and your mother <S%G3384><s%> Eunice; <S%G2131><s%> and I am persuaded <S%G3982><s%> that in you also. <S%G2532><s%>

Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I put <S%G363><s%> you in remembrance <S%G363><s%> that you stir <S%G329><s%> up the gift <S%G5486><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is in you by the putting <S%G1936><s%> on <S%G1936><s%> of my hands. <S%G5495><s%>

For God <S%G2316><s%> has not given <S%G1325><s%> us the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of fear; <S%G1167><s%> but of power, <S%G1411><s%> and of love, <S%G26><s%> and of a sound <S%G4995><s%> mind. <S%G4995><s%>

Be not you therefore <S%G3767><s%> ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of the testimony <S%G3142><s%> of our Lord, <S%G2962><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> of me his prisoner: <S%G1198><s%> but be you partaker <S%G4777><s%> of the afflictions <S%G4777><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the power <S%G1411><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> has saved <S%G4982><s%> us, and called <S%G2564><s%> us with an holy <S%G40><s%> calling, <S%G2821><s%> not according <S%G2596><s%> to our works, <S%G2041><s%> but according <S%G2596><s%> to his own <S%G2398><s%> purpose <S%G4286><s%> and grace, <S%G5485><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> us in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the world <S%G166><s%> began,

But is now <S%G3568><s%> made <S%G5319><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%> by the appearing <S%G2015><s%> of our Savior <S%G4990><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who has abolished <S%G2673><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> and has brought <S%G5461><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> and immortality <S%G861><s%> to light <S%G5461><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the gospel: <S%G2098><s%>
Whereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I am appointed <S%G5087><s%> a preacher, <S%G2783><s%> and an apostle, <S%G652><s%> and a teacher <S%G1320><s%> of the Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>

For the which <S%G3739><s%> cause <S%G156><s%> I also <S%G2532><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things: nevertheless <S%G235><s%> I am not ashamed: <S%G1870><s%> for I know <S%G1492><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have believed, <S%G4100><s%> and am persuaded <S%G3982><s%> that he is able <S%G1415><s%> to keep <S%G5442><s%> that which I have committed <S%G3866><s%> to him against <S%G1519><s%> that day. <S%G2250><s%>

Hold <S%G2192><s%> fast the form <S%G5296><s%> of sound <S%G5198><s%> words, <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have heard <S%G191><s%> of me, in faith <S%G4102><s%> and love <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
That good <S%G2570><s%> thing which was committed <S%G3872><s%> to you keep <S%G5442><s%> by the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> dwells <S%G1774><s%> in us.

This <S%G5124><s%> you know, <S%G1492><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> they which are in Asia <S%G773><s%> be turned <S%G654><s%> away <S%G654><s%> from me; of whom <S%G3739><s%> are Phygellus <S%G5436><s%> and Hermogenes. <S%G2061><s%>

The Lord <S%G2962><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> to the house <S%G3624><s%> of Onesiphorus; <S%G3683><s%> for he oft <S%G4178><s%> refreshed <S%G404><s%> me, and was not ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of my chain: <S%G254><s%>
But, when he was in Rome, <S%G4516><s%> he sought <S%G2212><s%> me out very <S%G4708><s%> diligently, <S%G4706><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> me.

The Lord <S%G2962><s%> grant <S%G1325><s%> to him that he may find <S%G2147><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> in that day: <S%G2250><s%> and in how <S%G3745><s%> many <S%G3745><s%> things he ministered <S%G1247><s%> to me at <S%G1722><s%> Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> you know <S%G1097><s%> very <S%G957><s%> well. <S%G957><s%>
